Jargon Term: You may take Dilaudid (hydromorphone) for pain but it is important not to drive, drink alcohol or take sedative medications while taking Dilaudid. Dilaudid causes constipation- therefore it is important to take a stool softener (Colace) while taking Dilaudid.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Medication

Jargon Term: Please call your doctor or return to the hospital for: * Fever (Temp > 101), chills * Abdominal pain * Nausea or vomiting * Chest pain * Shortness of breath * Worsening ankle pain * Any other symptoms that concern you
